ygData.subject: RE: How Lullaby used to be.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From:  ... What about the three DoT songs that only worked if you cast them on yourself? I m also surprised they don t have a way to
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Feb 2000 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> Just a point but the actual claim was that Verant are liars when they
> claim they have someone testing the bard. I think this claim is valid,
> as we have way too much evidence to show that no testing is done on the
> bard before patching at all. Even testing of changes specific to the

From: <kim@...>
>I wouldn't quite say that. Most of the problems I've seen
>with bard bugs have been due to secondary interations with
>spells. So they could quite easily be testing what they think
>a change might break, while missing some unanticipated
>interaction. (The levitate bug was simply unforgivable
>though.)

What about the three DoT songs that only worked if you cast them on
yourself?

I'm also surprised they don't have a way to test things on the test server
totally separate from what they patch in as an emergency fix. That tells me
that the only test server they have is THE test server. It also suggests
that the only testing they do is User testing by us. I seriously do not
believe they know what a coordinated, organized, methodical testing process
is, much less that they think they should use one.

Kit
